channel.title: Making A Client
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone could tell me how to make a client for my server. I have tried finding the client that goes with me server, but I have yet to find it. I was also wondering if i could just delete the models that don't match in the server's model file and the client's model file and would it run? I know right know that it disconnects me because the models don't match. Thank you!

item.title: Making A Client
